title: Viral Survival
description: Civilization has collapsed.Governments have fallen; countries lie in ruins. The infected are everywhere hunting down survivors, driven by the deadly virus coursing through their veins to spread their destructive infection or die trying.In West Wales a young girl tries to shield her sickly brother from the ravening hordes while mourning the loss of their father to the fatal infection.A team of scientists and former special forces operatives hide out at a secret facility.And Captain Richard Yorke, along with the survivors of his British Army unit have fought their way across the country to his isolated farm only to find that his wife, Anna, has fallen prey to the virus.He will soon discover that there are worse things out there than the infected.Viral Survival is the second book in the Virus Sequence, a post-apocalyptic thriller in the tradition of Dawn of the Dead and 28 Days Later.
author: Chris Braid
